channel.title: A forensics repo?
channel.description:
Hey,
A few days ago I stumbled upon an image forensics tool which was excellent at what it does in terms of identifying data of an image, however I was wondering whether anybody knows any good GitHub forensics repo's that has a bunch of different tools that may be used for a forensic analysis. What I mean by this is, recovering / viewing history of deleted files, scanning files or directories, preview of data from a disk and a lot more.
Let me know if you know any repo's that have a good list! :smiley:

item.title: A forensics repo?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: A forensics repo?
item.dc:creator: hoboscientist
item.description:
IMO https://github.com/Cugu/awesome-forensics is one of the best repos out there for that. Anything with an awesome in it is supposed to be a curated list of good references on github. I hope it helps.

Read full topic

item.description:
Hey,

What I mean by this is, recovering / viewing history of deleted files, scanning files or directories, preview of data from a disk and a lot more.
